About ZIGExN

Get excited to create Life Media Platforms from Vietnam to the World!

 üî∏ At ZIGExN VeNtura, we‚Äôre part of a larger vision driven by ZIGExN Co., Ltd., a leading life media platform company in Japan. Our parent company offers over 40 services in domains like jobs, housing, cars, and travel. Recognized with prestigious awards such as the Japan Technology Fast 50 (Deloitte, 2015) and named a Great Place to Work in Japan, ZIGExN is now expanding its global impact.

 üî∏ At ZIGExN VeNtura, we specialize in software development and Internet services, building multi-product solutions based on life media platforms. Our talented engineers in Ho Chi Minh, Hanoi, and Da Nang collaborate to develop innovations that make a difference.

 üî∏ In 2025, we‚Äôre all-in on AI ‚Äî combining intelligent automation with human creativity to build better, faster, and smarter.

 üî∏ This marks a turning point in how we work, collaborate, and create impact at scale.

Our Work

 üî∏ We act as a bridge between development teams in Vietnam and clients in Japan.

 üî∏ Through detailed discussions, negotiations, and document analysis, we clarify client requirements and communicate them effectively to the development team.

 üî∏ We manage the progress of diverse projects such as web applications (Ruby, PHP, Python) and mobile apps (iOS, Android) while supporting Japanese PMs and engineers.

 üî∏ Throughout the entire development lifecycle, we provide clients with timely progress updates and valuable technical advice.

 üî∏ Additionally, we actively participate in internal training and talent development, contributing to a strong and positive company culture.

work:
Trusting Social is a pioneering FinTech company at the forefront of revolutionizing credit scoring and driving financial inclusion on a global scale. We're committed to enabling fair and equitable access to financial services for everyone, harnessing the power of artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning (ML), and big data analytics. This allows us to build advanced credit assessment models that empower financial institutions to accurately evaluate creditworthiness, even for individuals and businesses with limited or no traditional credit history.

Building on our strong foundations in Southeast Asia, Trusting Social has expanded its reach, including operations in the United States, to bridge the credit gap for millions worldwide. Our cutting-edge solutions not only mitigate risk for financial partners but also unlock unprecedented opportunities for economic growth and empowerment across diverse markets. We're relentlessly innovating, shaping a more inclusive, efficient, and equitable global financial landscape for the digital age.
